titleStmt.title: A letter from Lysbone, directed to Captain Thomas Harrison: wherein is contained a brief relation of the several transactions between the Parliaments fleet, and Prince Ruperts, both lying in the river of Lysbone. Also the King of Portugals congratulation with the States General. Together with a list of the several vessels and commanders of each fleet.
titleStmt.author: Hasclock, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Lodowick Lloyd and Henry Cripps, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill. 13. 1649"; the imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
